synopsis.text: To avenge a gruesome ghoul attack that left his friend hospitalized and another dead, high school rebel Taishi Fura teams up with an unlikely allyâ€”none other than the quiet, unassuming Kishou Arima, a fellow classmate and undercover investigator for the Commission of Counter Ghoul (CCG). In their shared pursuit of the man-eating ghoul known as Lantern, the duo forms an unbreakable bond as they navigate the dark underbelly of Tokyo's 13th Ward. As they hunt for Lantern, the story unveils the untold past of the CCG's future 'Reaper,' Arima, offering a rare glimpse into his high school days. Prepare for a thrilling ride in Tokyo Ghoul: 'Jack' as Fura and Arima embark on a dangerous journey that will ultimately shape their destinies.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
